page.title: 15MRS.ROBINSON
page.content: {Mrs.Robinson}is the{headteacher}of {Mount-Pleasant Infant School.}Going to a{restaurant}to have a{nice meal}and going to{cricket matches}make her {happy.}She{hates}it when the{boys and {girls}are{naughty}and when people throw{litter}on the playground. If she won{Â£100,000}she would{spend}alot, {give some away}and{save}the rest. Mrs.Robinson likes her{dog, Yorkie because he is a{loveable dog}and takes good care of her. There are{13 {teachers}working in the{infant school. There is{1 headteacher, 11 teachers and 1 teacher doing a{part-time}job in the{morning.}She has taught about {6000 children}in her life. Mrs.Robinson has been a{teacher}for {32yrs}and a{head teacher}for{17yrs. She has{no children}of her own.
